photoURL.description: The URL of the user's profile photo.

admin.description: Whether the user has admin privileges.

isSuperAdmin.description: Whether the user has super admin privileges.

Episode.title: Episode
Episode.description: Represents a single episode within a season.

Season.title: Season
Season.description: Represents a season of a web series or drama.

Content.title: Content
Content.description: Represents a movie, web series, or drama.

tmdbId.description: The Movie Database (TMDB) ID for sourcing video.

description.description: A short description of the content.

bannerImageUrl.description: URL for the banner image used in carousels and grids.

posterImageUrl.description: URL for the high-resolution poster image used in hero sections and the video player.

categories.description: A list of categories or tags for the content.

isFeatured.description: If true, this content will be featured in the hero banner on the homepage.

embedUrl.description: Optional direct embed URL (for movies) or iframe code. This will be used instead of automated sources if provided.

downloadUrl.description: Optional single direct download URL for the entire content (movie or series).

seasons.description: Manual override for seasons and episodes, for series and dramas.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the content was created.

updatedAt.description: The timestamp when the content was last updated.

ChatMessage.title: Chat Message
ChatMessage.description: Represents a single message in the community chat.

text.description: The content of the chat message.

userId.description: The UID of the user who sent the message.

userName.description: The display name of the user.

userPhotoURL.description: The profile picture URL of the user.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the message was sent.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores public information about a user.

/content/{contentId}.description: Stores all content items like movies, web series, and dramas.

/community-chat/{messageId}.description: Stores messages for the global community chat.
